sources.title: The Soft Kill (1994) Mystery & Thriller film
sources.description:
Former cop Jack Ramsey wants to move to Oregon, but there's a problem...

Director: Eli Cohen
Writers: Yitzhak Ginsberg, Alex Kustanovich, Michele Noble

Main cast:
Michael Harris - John Stewart
Brion James - Ben McCarthy
Carrie-Anne Moss - Jane Tanner
Matt McCoy - Vinnie Lupino
Corbin Bernsen - Martin Lewis
Kim Morgan Greene - Kimberly Lewis

Genres: Action, Mystery, Thriller
Release date: 1994
Filming location: Los Angeles


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: Private investigator and former police detective Jack Ramsey is enjoying an affair with the local district attorney's wife, but no longer, after she is strangled soon after he has departed following a session of amorous activity.
metadata.Writer: Yitzhak Ginsberg, Alex Kustanovich, Michele Noble
metadata.Actors: Michael Harris, Brion James, Carrie-Anne Moss
